website_summaries.verdict: The supercomfortable Sony MDR-1A does a good job balancing clarity with just enough of laid-backness to make it a very versatile headphone that's well worth considering if you're looking for a full-size headphone in the $250-$300 range.
pros: The Sony MDR-1A is a relatively lightweight, very comfortable full-size headphone that offers sound  that's improved over the MDR-1R's, with better definition from the bass through the midrange to the treble
The headphones now sit on your neck correctly (the earcups rotate the proper direction) and you get two cables, one of which has an in-line remote for smartphones, along with a nice carrying pouch
cons: in-line remote lacks some functionality for iPhone users

customer_reviews.title: Great base, well-balanced
customer_reviews.text: I was totally crushed when my sony MDR-700v cans were discontinued. I bought four different pairs of headphones (these, a used pair of 700v, pioneer HDJs and a slightly less expensive version of the MDR-1a) to replace my broken pair. This one was the clear winner...no sound leakage when over the ears. You're in the room. Great base, well-balanced, deep tones. Super comfortable and the light blue steel metal with chocolate brown leather is stunning. They weigh as much as a feather. Couldn't be happier. Highly recommend for aficionados and film/sound editors (like me).
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are amazing. The sound is perfect and they are the ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing. The sound is perfect and they are the most comfortable over-ear I've ever worn. This was a well-researched purchase on my part, so at least at the time of this review, definitely buy on Amazon (or a store that will price-match).
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Q. Szofer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones with a cable issue
customer_reviews.text: The headphones sound amazing and have terrific bass. Everything was as advertised sound wise, but the cables both broke within 10 months of having them (the first broke within a month). I took very good care of them by doing things like winding them in a ring and putting them in the protective case, but still had to buy a $20 replacement in order to use the headphones. Other than the cable, these are fantastic and I would recommend them to anyone who loves listening to music!
customer_reviews.author: Rhett Boatright

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my husband. He did a ton of research before deciding on these. He loves the sound quality and says that they are hands down the most comfortable headphones ever. The brown and silver coloring is really beautiful. Also great customer service! These headphones came in weeks earlier than we expected them to.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Lehmkuhl

customer_reviews.title: Holy smokes.  Best over ear headphones ive heard
customer_reviews.text: Great Bass, great clarity and laid back. The whole purpose of these is not to monitor or reference, these were maid to enjoy music. Im sure you can listen to music for 10 hours straight and there would be no listening fatigue nor comfort issues. In a scale of 1 to 10 these are a major win lol.
customer_reviews.author: Azael Pulido

customer_reviews.title: Too much bass
customer_reviews.text: Too much bass. I don't know it is just of this one I bought and returned, or the traits of this product. But I can take so much bass, especially when it is not clear. The drum keeps booming even after it should stop, and make me hardly be able to focus on the music itself. Maybe I am not a fan of bass, but I know how a good bass should sound like. This one is not acceptable. The quality and packaging are fine as Sony products always did. So not one star.
customer_reviews.author: Chengdong Lu

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, no batteries required and super light but kind of expensive if you willing to expend some bucks this are great headphones
customer_reviews.author: Juan Franco

customer_reviews.title: A very nice pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: A very nice pair of headphones. Wanted something more portable than my Sen 600HD's which required a closed ear. Listen mainly with Fiio Mont Blanc Amp and X3 Gen2 so it handles high res files very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Chip M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: They sound great too, cnet gave them a 9 out of ...
customer_reviews.text: If you looking for the most comfy, light head phones , these are them. They sound great too, cnet gave them a 9 out of 10 for sound. Buy a dac and it will make them produce sounds that are just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've used them for quite a while. Mostly female vocals, punk rock and pop rock. I used them with the focusrite scarlett solo 2nd gen USB audio interface. I'm more than impressed with their sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nuris Nisic

customer_reviews.title: Great look, very good sound
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, great look, but the sound could be a little better. The sound is very clear, but too much bass during some songs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sound to listen to your Hi-res audio and very ...
customer_reviews.text: After months of using... Best sound to listen to your Hi-res audio and very comfortable. Lightweight and can wear it for hours!
customer_reviews.author: RS2

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely excellent headphones, shipped fast and are just
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely excellent headphones, shipped fast and are just... perfect. I'll write a better review when I feel like it, but these are GOOOOOD.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Kraemer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and sounds awesome
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these headphones. I previously bought the Audio-Technicha MSR 7's and while I was impressed with the sound quality, I had to return them because they felt like a vice grip on my head. I did some research on good sound quality AND comfortable headphones in the $200-300 range. I decided to try these Sony MDR-1A's and I'm really glad that I did. These headphones are extremely comfortable on my head. I almost forget that they're on my head sometimes. In my opinion the sound quality is great too. I listen mostly to video game soundtracks, classic rock, and classical music. These headphones sound absolutely great for those genres. I would definitely recommend these headphones
customer_reviews.author: Bsto

customer_reviews.title: Sound like $150 fashion headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and comfortable. Construction feels okay, but is mainly fake leather and plastic. Cable is awkwardly ribbed and short, also has a proprietary connector which is annoying. The sound is.. okay. The bass is bloated, the highs are rolled off and the mids are far too recessed. Fan of female vocal EDM? These may cut it, just don't expect to be amazed by much else. If you can handle some sound leak, the Philips SHP9500's beat the sound on these in every way and are only $73. Personally I am returning my pair and spending an extra $100 on the far superior Senheisser HD600's.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good price to buy
customer_reviews.text: Good portable headphone very comfortable and sound quality also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Levy Lu

customer_reviews.title: Great all around
customer_reviews.text: Really like the headphones, great sound. Good noise isolation but could have slightly more bass.
customer_reviews.author: Bailly Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality & great design, only wish the cable is a little longer (1ft.).
customer_reviews.author: RAMON ROQUE

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Headphones
customer_reviews.text: There are no words in the English language that can truly definitely explain the sound quality of these cans.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Cuida

customer_reviews.title: These headphones were amazing..
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were amazing... until they died just now after 6 months. This shouldn't happen with $200 headphones. Upon reviewing my order, I see that the product description says "International version" and that the US warranty may not apply. Will be inquiring about a refund/replacement. Back to the old Sennheisers I go.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: you cant go wrong with this one
customer_reviews.text: 1- packing quality is top 2- the headset is light weight and can be used for long hours 3- build quality is top and can take few hits 4- sound is Amazing and clear. you will hear new sounds from differrent angles of the same song you to liste to.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrah AlMusallam
